name: Likeness Help by Shurik
description:
This goes in the positive prompt.

I was messing with some stuff and trained this. I don't exactly know if this is worth uploading, but here it is. I use it mostly for closeup portraits. Seems to help correct fisheye lens effects and blend the prompt with the character LoRa better. Ultimately, I don't know what this does exactly.

I don't know if "Likeness Help" is even accurate, but since many of my sample images on other LoRas use that name, I'll stick with it.

See the example grid for how it changes things.

meta.prompt:
haesicks <lora:haesicks-v15-byShurik:1>clean skin (closeup) looking at viewer
(LikenessHelpbyShurik3:0) In this hauntingly intimate close-up, the Southern gal is shown with only her shoulders and head above the water's surface. The dim, moody lighting casts shadows across her face, creating a sense of mystery and intrigue. (Best quality: 1.3) Water droplets glisten on her skin, emphasizing the wetness and adding a touch of ethereal beauty. (Detailed: 1.2) Her eyes, filled with a mix of determination and trepidation, reflect the uncertain depths below. The water surrounding her face distorts her features, evoking a sense of otherworldliness and submerged vulnerability. (Moody dramatic light: 1.4) The stillness of the barn and the distant sounds of dripping water heighten the eerie atmosphere, as if something mysterious lurks beneath the surface. (Close-up expression: 1.3) The viewer is left captivated by the enigmatic scene, drawn into the tension and anticipation of what lies beneath the water.
meta.negativePrompt: asian, chinese, BadDream UnrealisticDream, blemishes, car

meta.prompt: JenniferConnelly, <lora:JenniferConnelly-v15-byShurik:1>clean skin (closeup) looking at viewer (LikenessHelpbyShurik3:0) robot In this striking close-up, a female version of RoboCop stands as a powerful symbol of strength and femininity. (Best quality: 1.3) Her metallic visage, adorned with sleek armor and intricate details, showcases her formidable presence as a cybernetic law enforcement officer. The contrast of her robotic features with the addition of vibrant, bold lipstick creates a captivating juxtaposition. (Detailed: 1.2) The carefully applied lipstick adds a touch of femininity, accentuating her human-like lips and drawing attention to the harmonious fusion of man and machine. It is a subtle reminder that beneath the exterior of technology lies a woman who embraces her identity and individuality. (Lipstick accentuation: 1.3) Her piercing gaze, enhanced by glowing visor-like eyes, radiates determination and focus. It reflects the unwavering commitment to justice and protection that drives her actions. The reflection of the cityscape in her visor hints at the challenges she faces as she patrols the streets, a silent guardian fighting against crime. (Intense gaze: 1.4)<lora:LuisapHumanoidRobots_v1:1> ,

meta.prompt:
haesicks <lora:haesicks-v15-byShurik:1>clean skin (closeup) looking at viewer
(LikenessHelpbyShurik3:0)
In a vibrant and festive birthday party scene, a female clown brings laughter and entertainment to the celebration. (Best quality: 1.3) The setting is adorned with colorful decorations, balloons, and a backdrop of excitement. (Masterpiece: 1.3) Meticulous attention is given to the clown's costume, which features a vibrant and playful ensemble, complete with a rainbow-colored wig, a polka-dot jumpsuit, and oversized shoes. (8K: 1.2) The high-resolution imagery captures the vividness of the colors and the intricate details of the costume, showcasing the meticulous craftsmanship. (Close-up shot style: 1.4) The camera zooms in, highlighting the clown's expressive face, adorned with exaggerated makeup, including a bright red nose, rosy cheeks, and a wide, painted smile. (Realistic art style: 1.3) The artwork captures the clown's infectious energy and enthusiasm as she engages with the children, her eyes twinkling with mischief and her gestures animated with joy. With a playful and gentle demeanor, she captivates the young audience, eliciting laughter and wonder with her comedic antics, magic tricks, and balloon twisting skills. The image encapsulates the spirit of joy and entertainment, as the female clown creates cherished memories and brings happiness to the birthday celebration. (Full body: 1.2)

(Close-up: 1.3) The collar frames her face beautifully, drawing attention to her features and highlighting her confidence. The color of the shirt complements her skin tone, enhancing her natural beauty. The scene is illuminated with soft, flattering lighting, casting a gentle glow on her face. The viewer is captivated by her poise and professionalism, and can't help but be drawn to her captivating presence.

In this eerie depiction, the sensual petite woman cautiously pokes her head out from within a tiny room, heightening the suspense and tension of a horror movie scene. Her eyes, wide with a mixture of fear and curiosity, dart around the confined space, while her slightly parted lips betray her anxious breaths. (Best quality: 1.3) The camera captures a close-up shot, focusing on her partially visible face within the limited room, surrounded by claustrophobic darkness. (Masterpiece: 1.3) The artwork conveys a palpable sense of unease, capturing the intensity of the moment and the anticipation of impending danger. (Detailed: 1.2) Dim lighting casts haunting shadows, creating an ominous atmosphere that permeates the cramped quarters. (Close-up shot style: 1.3, Ominous lighting: 1.2) This portrayal captures the gripping suspense as she peeks out from the confines of the tiny room, her face revealing both trepidation and a determination to confront whatever horrors lie beyond. haesicks <lora:haesicks-v15-byShurik:1>clean skin (closeup) looking at viewer

a chilling presence emerges, drawing the attention of onlookers with a mix of fascination and unease. (Best quality: 1.3) The female clown's face is a canvas of haunting artistry, adorned with intricate and exaggerated clown makeup that defies the norms of traditional beauty. (Dramatic transformation: 1.3) Dark, smudged colors accentuate her features, highlighting the stark contrast between the painted visage and her pale, porcelain-like skin. Her wide, twisted smile stretches unnaturally across her face, revealing a row of sharp, pointed teeth that hint at an underlying darkness. (Chilling expression: 1.2)
The play of shadows dances upon her face, casting ominous patterns that seem to move with a life of their own. (Moody lighting: 1.4) Eyes rimmed with smoky hues peer out from beneath thickly painted brows, their intensity piercing through the darkness. The gaze is unnerving, a mix of mischief and malevolence that lingers in the air. (Piercing intensity: 1.3)
The clown's attire is a reflection of her twisted persona, a mismatched ensemble of vibrant colors and tattered fabrics. Ruffled layers of a once-bright dress now hang in disarray, accentuating the disheveled nature of her appearance. Striped stockings cling tightly to her legs, creating a stark contrast to the worn and scuffed boots that bear the signs of countless journeys.
As the eerie female clown leans forward with an unnerving grace, the room seems to hush in anticipation. The air becomes heavy with an unspoken tension, as if the very atmosphere holds its breath in a mix of curiosity and fear. (Captivating presence: 1.3) This enigmatic figure embodies the duality of attraction and repulsion, leaving an indelible mark on those who dare to witness her unsettling beauty.
